<?xml version="1.0"?> <!-- ================================================================= Filter to create a DocTitle for Citation XML ================================================================== -->
<xsl:transform xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0" xmlns:cdr="cips.nci.nih.gov/cdr"> <xsl:output method="text"/>
<!-- Filter written by C.Burg - 8-29-2001 --> <!-- Modified 2001-12-14 bkline to truncate overlong titles. --> <!-- This program is a filter to display a PDQ citation title-->
<!-- ==================================================================== Display PDQ or Medline Citation Title,and truncate to 255 characters if necessary ==================================================================== -->
<xsl:template match="Citation"> <!-- Display citation title and pubication details --> <xsl:for-each select="PDQCitation/CitationTitle | PubmedArticle/MedlineCitation/Article/ArticleTitle"> <xsl:value-of select="substring(string(.), 0, 255)"/> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:template> </xsl:transform>
